DMT01 Table 1 (Default) Demographics and Baseline Characteristics Table

dmt01_1.Rd

For each variable, summary statistics are by default based on the number of patients in the corresponding n row.

dmt01_1(
  ad_bl,
  armvar = .study$armvar,
  summaryvars = .study$summaryvars,
  lbl_overall = .study$lbl_overall,
  prune_0 = TRUE,
  deco = std_deco("DMT01"),
  .study = list(armvar = "ARM", summaryvars = c("AAGE", "AGEGR1", "SEX", "ETHNIC",
    "RACE", "BWGHTSI"), lbl_overall = "All Patients")
)

dmt01_1_lyt(
  armvar = .study$armvar,
  summaryvars = .study$summaryvars,
  summaryvars_lbls = var_labels_for(ad_bl, summaryvars),
  lbl_overall = .study$lbl_overall,
  deco = std_deco("DMT01"),
  .study = list(armvar = "ARM", summaryvars = c("AAGE", "AGEGR1", "SEX", "ETHNIC",
    "RACE", "BWGHTSI"), overall_col = "All Patients")
)

Arguments

ad_bl

subject baseline dataset with one row per patient
armvar

variable used for column splitting
summaryvars

(vector of strings) variables summarized in demographic table.
lbl_overall

label used for overall column, if set to NULL the overall column is omitted
prune_0

remove 0 count rows
deco

decoration list with title, subtitles and main_footer content
.study

a list with default values for the arguments of the function
summaryvars_lbls

(vector of strings) labels corresponding to the analyzed variables.

Value

Details

  • Default demographic and characteristics table

  • If not specified otherwise, numbers represent absolute numbers of patients and fraction of N

  • Remove zero-count rows

  • Split columns by arm (planned or actual / code or description)

  • Include a total column by default

Functions

  • dmt01_1_lyt:

Examples

library(scda)
adsl <- synthetic_cdisc_data("rcd_2021_03_22")$adsl

dmt01_1(ad_bl = adsl, summaryvars = c("AGE", "RACE", "SEX"))

#> Main Title
#> Protocol: {{protocol}}, Snapshot: {{snapshot}}, Snapshot Date: {{snapshot-date}}, Cutoff Date: {{cutoff-date}}
#>

#>                                               A: Drug X    B: Placebo   C: Combination   All Patients

dmt01_1(
 ad_bl = adsl,
 armvar = "ARMCD",
 summaryvars = c("AGE", "RACE")
)
